behaviour: It can slide one cell orthogonally or diagonally. If it has never been threatened and it has never moved, and there is a friendly rook three cells to its east that has never moved, it can slide two cells east then the rook will hop two cells west. If it has never been threatened and it has never moved, and there is a friendly rook four cells to its west that has never moved, it can slide three cells west then the rook will hop two cells east.
